nodes.text: Frenk were a sentient humanoid species from the planet Gorobei. The species had an armed force called the Frenk military, of which Rumi Paramita may have been a former member.

The Frenk were a tall species, with most members reaching heights above 2 meters. They had red or green skin and four nostrils set upon a narrow snout and had four fingers on each hand, with the one next to the thumb being the larger. All known members of this species were very agile and fast.
Rumi Paramita, a member of the species, was a female bounty hunter who operated during the Clone Wars and was a fellow friend to Zabrak bounty hunter Sugi.
Another hunter by the name of Twazzi, was part of the Confederacy's plan to kidnap the Chancellor.
